channel.title: contracts for difference on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in contracts for difference on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
IG Group Logo
IG Group is a British company providing trading in financial derivatives such as contracts for difference and financial spread betting and, as of 2014, stockbroking to retail traders. While the majority of the company’s activities are based in the UK, the company has expanded internationally. IG is regulated by the FCA, the UK’s financial authority body. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index.
You can download theIG Grouplogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: IG Group
item.description: IG Group is a British company providing trading in financial derivatives such as contracts for difference and financial spread betting and, as of 2014, stockbroking to retail traders. While the majority of the company’s activities are based in the UK, the company has expanded internationally. IG is regulated by the FCA, the UK’s financial authority body. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index.
